verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Depart|strong="H3212"\w*, \add and\add* go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* hence, thou and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* which thou hast brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which I \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, to \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, and to \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Unto thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it:

And I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* an \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee; and I will drive \w out|strong="H1644"\w* the \w Canaanite|strong="H3669"\w*, the \w Amorite|strong="H0567"\w*, and the \w Hittite|strong="H2850"\w*, and the \w Perizzite|strong="H6522"\w*, the \w Hivite|strong="H2340"\w*, and the \w Jebusite|strong="H2983"\w*:

Unto a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w flowing|strong="H2100"\w* with \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*: for I will not go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of thee; for thou \add art\add* a \w stiffnecked|strong="H7186"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: lest I \w consume|strong="H3615"\w* thee in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.

¶ And when the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* these \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w tidings|strong="H1697"\w*, they \w mourned|strong="H0056"\w*: and no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* did \w put|strong="H7896"\w* on him his \w ornaments|strong="H5716"\w*.

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Ye \add are\add* a \w stiffnecked|strong="H7186"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: I will come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of thee in \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w moment|strong="H7281"\w*, and \w consume|strong="H3615"\w* thee: therefore now put \w off|strong="H3381"\w* thy \w ornaments|strong="H5716"\w* from thee, that I may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* what to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto thee.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w stripped|strong="H5337"\w* themselves of their \w ornaments|strong="H5716"\w* by the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*, and \w pitched|strong="H5186"\w* it \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, afar \w off|strong="H7368"\w* from the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* it the \w Tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*. And it came to pass, \add that\add* every one which \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* unto the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, which \add was\add* \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*.

And it came to pass, when \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* unto the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*, \add that\add* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add at\add* his \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w*, and \w looked|strong="H5027"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, until he was \w gone|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*.

And it came to pass, as \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*, the \w cloudy|strong="H6051"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* \w descended|strong="H3381"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \add at\add* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*, and \add the \+nd LORD\+nd*\add* \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w cloudy|strong="H6051"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \add at\add* the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w*: and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* and \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add in\add* his \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* to \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, as a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w speaketh|strong="H1696"\w* unto his \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*. And he turned \w again|strong="H7725"\w* into the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*: but his \w servant|strong="H8334"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*, a young \w man|strong="H5288"\w*, \w departed|strong="H4185"\w* not \w out|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w See|strong="H7200"\w*, thou \w sayest|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Bring \w up|strong="H5927"\w* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and thou hast not let me \w know|strong="H3045"\w* whom thou wilt \w send|strong="H7971"\w* with me. Yet thou hast \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* thee by \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and thou hast also \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* in my \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.

Now therefore, I pray thee, if I have \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* in thy \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, \w shew|strong="H3045"\w* me now thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, that I may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* thee, that I may \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* in thy \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*: and \w consider|strong="H7200"\w* that this \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \add is\add* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, My \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* shall \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \add with thee\add*, and I will give thee \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*.
And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, If thy \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* not \add with me\add*, carry us not \w up|strong="H5927"\w* hence.

For wherein shall it be \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w here|strong="H0645"\w* that I and thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* have \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* in thy \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*? \add is it\add* not in that thou \w goest|strong="H3212"\w* with us? so shall we be \w separated|strong="H6395"\w*, I and thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, from all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add are\add* upon the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, I will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* also that thou hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*: for thou hast \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* in my \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, and I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* thee by \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.
And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I beseech \w thee|strong="H4994"\w*, \w shew|strong="H7200"\w* me thy \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will make all my \w goodness|strong="H2898"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* before thee, and I will \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee; and will be \w gracious|strong="H2603"\w* to whom I will be \w gracious|strong="H2603"\w*, and will shew \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* on whom I will shew \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou \w canst|strong="H3201"\w* not \w see|strong="H7200"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w*: for there shall no \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* me, and \w live|strong="H2425"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, \add there is\add* a \w place|strong="H4725"\w* by me, and thou shalt \w stand|strong="H5324"\w* upon a \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*:

And it shall come to pass, while my \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* passeth \w by|strong="H5674"\w*, that I will \w put|strong="H7760"\w* thee in a \w clift|strong="H5366"\w* of the \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*, and will \w cover|strong="H5526"\w* thee with my \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w while|strong="H5704"\w* I pass \w by|strong="H5674"\w*:

And I will \w take|strong="H5493"\w* away mine \w hand|strong="H3709"\w*, and thou shalt \w see|strong="H7200"\w* my back \w parts|strong="H0268"\w*: but my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* shall not be \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*.
